Distribution. Palaearctic; Ukraine : Cherkasy , Chernigiv, Crimea , Donetsk , Ivano-Frankivsk , Kharkiv , Kherson , Khmelnytskyi , Kyiv , Lugansk , Mykolaiv , Odesa , Poltava , Ternopil , Transcarpathian, Vinnytsya , and Zaporizhzhya Regs.
Biology. CMF, CEMF, CSF, EEFS, PS, PMF. April–October.
